opensource.title: Kwik
opensource.subtitle: REST API Framework
opensource.description: A modern, batteries-included, business-oriented REST API framework built on Python 3.12+. Provides pre-configured tooling including pagination, filtering, and sorting with a unified interface.

opensource.title: Simulatte
opensource.subtitle: Discrete Event Simulation
opensource.description: A Python framework for discrete event simulation of logistics and manufacturing systems. Designed for warehouse simulation, production line analysis, and intra-logistics process modeling.

industrial.title: RFID Real-Time Inventory
industrial.subtitle: Fashion Retail
industrial.description: ML-powered in-store inventory management using RFID. Developed a novel Software-Based Shielding technique to distinguish items on the store floor from those in the back office, without physical barriers. Patent application filed.

industrial.title: Entity Embeddings Demand Forecasting
industrial.subtitle: Haute Couture Fashion
industrial.description: Deep Neural Network for intermittent demand forecasting in the fashion industry. Uses entity embeddings to handle products with no historical time series by learning commercial similarities between current and past products.

industrial.title: AI Image Tracking System
industrial.subtitle: Artisanal Food Industry
industrial.description: Real-time object detection and tracking system for ham curing processes. Uses transfer learning to recognize and track individual hams through curing, enabling quality prediction and competitive advantage.

industrial.title: Goods-to-Pickers Optimization
industrial.subtitle: Automated Warehouse Systems
industrial.description: 20-months industrial research project developing advanced optimization methodologies for order case picking in goods-to-pickers systems. Applied metaheuristics to real-world logistics automation challenges.

industrial.title: Automated Assembly Line Simulation
industrial.subtitle: Digital Twin for Automotive
industrial.description: Digital twin development for electric motor assembly lines using discrete event simulation. Focused on performance optimization, downtime reduction, and internal logistics improvement.

industrial.title: Project Management Software Solution
industrial.subtitle: ETO Project-based Companies
industrial.description: 24-months project as lead and coordinator developing AI-based solutions for logistics process optimization. Includes internal messaging system for LLM-based data collection and analysis.
